description:
V1.4.4 : 
Now with Users sent pictures. You want to appear in the app? Send us your most beautiful pictures!

*** Diaporama feature: The Orchids Wallpaper application now let you display flowers as diaporama. Select all flowers or only the one you cherish, then select the turnover period (be it 1 min, 1 hour, 1 day or 1 week) and let the application work for you and change your wallpaper automatically***

You have flowers picts you'll like to see included in this application ? Symply email your picts at contact@its-on-mobile.com and we will select, redesign and post to the community. 


*** PIMP your palm with those beautifull wallpaper designed specifically for your Palm !!**
A 60+ collection of rare orchids and tropical flowers. Simply discover or insert as wallpaper.
Unbelievable range of natural colors and shape from several Orchid families: 
- the georgeous “lady orchid” a tall graceful orchid, Orchis purpurea, with faintly scented purple-brown and green flowers with a pinkish or white lip

- the surprising “bee orchid”, originated from Europe, Ophrys apifera, whose flower resembles a bumble bee in shape and colour

- the “jewel orchids” - any of several delicate Asiatic orchids grown especially for their velvety leaves with metallic white or gold veining

- the “frog orchids”,  having greenish flowers thought to resemble small frogs, esp Coeloglossum viride of calcareous turf.

- “spider orchid”, of the genus Ophrys, esp O. sphegodes, having a flower with yellow, green, or pink sepals and a broad brown velvety lip

And unique species such as: 
- Insect eating Nepenthes orchidee carnivore
- the endangered bat orchids
- the hybrid leopard print orchid

Will you recognize them ?
